name: Chocolate Chili
steps: Form the ground beef into 4 equal patties. Dent the center slightly with your thumb.
Season liberally with salt and pepper on both sides.
Grill or pan-fry over high heat for 3-4 minutes per side.
In the last minute of cooking, place a slice of cheese on each patty and cover to melt.
Assemble: Bottom bun, lettuce, tomato, patty, pickles, sauce, top bun.
